Articles.Content:
Yes yes, I know the pictures are VERY bad quality. Imgur is having some issues today.

Anyways, here are two mobile launch vehicles I threw together in a couple hours.

Maybe it'll spark some inspiration, I dunno. But I would love to see someone launch one from the second space center.

Here dey are: http://imgur.com/a/cFvWm#0

The one to the left is a standard rocket, to the right is a small probe that can go up to 3000 meters, no more.
